DataElement.preferredName: Person Disease Contact Investigation Status Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the person's disease contact investigation status.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._A public health activity whereby individuals who have been exposed to a person with a suspected or confirmed contagious illness are identified, usually for the purpose of identifying additional cases of the illness, or to offer some form of prophylactic intervention to either prevent or ameliorate disease in the exposed individual._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A human being.:A public health activity whereby individuals who have been exposed to a person with a suspected or confirmed contagious illness are identified, usually for the purpose of identifying additional cases of the illness, or to offer some form of prophylactic intervention to either prevent or ameliorate disease in the exposed individual.

Concepts.definition: A public health activity whereby individuals who have been exposed to a person with a suspected or confirmed contagious illness are identified, usually for the purpose of identifying additional cases of the illness, or to offer some form of prophylactic intervention to either prevent or ameliorate disease in the exposed individual.

Property.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A public health activity whereby individuals who have been exposed to a person with a suspected or confirmed contagious illness are identified, usually for the purpose of identifying additional cases of the illness, or to offer some form of prophylactic intervention to either prevent or ameliorate disease in the exposed individual._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who has been in close contact with a individual with a confirmed infection, or who may have been to a location of a disease outbreak and is exhibiting symptoms of the infection.

Concepts.definition: A person who has been in close contact with a individual with a confirmed infection, or who may have been to a location of a disease outbreak and is exhibiting symptoms of the infection.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Having been established or verified.: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.
